speaker: red
dialog: I'm not really sure how to tell you this...

speaker: blue
dialog: Just give it to me straight, Doc

speaker: red
dialog:
According to your charts, you only have one, 
maybe two years left to live.

speaker: red
dialog:
I understand that this is a lot to take in, but I can 
assure you that this condition of yours is no joking matter.

speaker: red
dialog:
If you agree to it, we would like to keep you here a 
bit longer to run some more tests.

speaker: blue
dialog: Just do whatever you need to do.

speaker: red
dialog:
Nurse Yellow will assist you in the last room at the 
end of the hallway...
